ayahs.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدْ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَـٰذَا نَصَبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [Then when] جَاوَزَا [they had passed beyond] قَالَ [he said] لِفَتَىٰهُ [to his boy] ءَاتِنَا [Bring us] غَدَآءَنَا [our morning meal] لَقَدْ [Certainly] لَقِينَا [we have suffered] مِن [in] سَفَرِنَا [our journey] هَـٰذَا [this] نَصَبًۭا [fatigue]
ayahs.transliteration: Falamma jawaza qalalifatahu atina ghadaana laqadlaqeena min safarina hatha nasaba

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ أَرَءَيْتَ إِذْ أَوَيْنَآ إِلَى ٱلصَّخْرَةِ فَإِنِّى نَسِيتُ ٱلْحُوتَ وَمَآ أَنسَىٰنِيهُ إِلَّا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَنْ أَذْكُرَهُۥ ۚ وَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ عَجَبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَرَءَيْتَ [Did you see] إِذْ [when] أَوَيْنَآ [we retired] إِلَى [to] ٱلصَّخْرَةِ [the rock] فَإِنِّى [Then indeed, I] نَسِيتُ [[I] forgot] ٱلْحُوتَ [the fish] وَمَآ [And not] أَنسَىٰنِيهُ [made me forget it] إِلَّا [except] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ [the Shaitaan] أَنْ [that] أَذْكُرَهُۥ ۚ [I mention it] وَٱتَّخَذَ [And it took] سَبِيلَهُۥ [its way] فِى [into] ٱلْبَحْرِ [the sea] عَجَبًۭا [amazingly]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala araayta ith awaynaila assakhrati fa-innee naseetu alhootawama ansaneehu illa ashshaytanuan athkurahu wattakhatha sabeelahu fee albahriAAajaba

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبْغِ ۚ فَٱرْتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] ذَٰلِكَ [That] مَا [(is) what] كُنَّا [we were] نَبْغِ ۚ [seeking] فَٱرْتَدَّا [So they returned] عَلَىٰٓ [on] ءَاثَارِهِمَا [their footprints] قَصَصًۭا [retracing]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala thalika ma kunnanabghi fartadda AAala atharihimaqasasa

ayahs.textUthmani: فَوَجَدَا عَبْدًا مِّنْ عِبَادِنَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّا عِلْمًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَوَجَدَا [Then they found] عَبْدًۭا [a servant] مِّنْ [from] عِبَادِنَآ [Our servants] ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [whom We had given] رَحْمَةًۭ [mercy] مِّنْ [from] عِندِنَا [Us] وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ [and We had taught him] مِن [from] لَّدُنَّا [Us] عِلْمًۭا [a knowledge]
ayahs.transliteration: Fawajada AAabdan min AAibadinaataynahu rahmatan min AAindinawaAAallamnahu min ladunna AAilma

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ هَلْ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُعَلِّمَنِ مِمَّا عُلِّمْتَ رُشْدًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [Said] لَهُۥ [to him] مُوسَىٰ [Musa] هَلْ [May] أَتَّبِعُكَ [I follow you] عَلَىٰٓ [on] أَن [that] تُعَلِّمَنِ [you teach me] مِمَّا [of what] عُلِّمْتَ [you have been taught] رُشْدًۭا [(of) right guidance]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala lahu moosa halattabiAAuka AAala an tuAAallimani mimma AAullimtarushda

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنَّكَ [Indeed, you] لَن [never] تَسْتَطِيعَ [will be able] مَعِىَ [with me] صَبْرًۭا [(to have) patience]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَكَيْفَ تَصْبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ خُبْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَكَيْفَ [And how can] تَصْبِرُ [you have patience] عَلَىٰ [for] مَا [what] لَمْ [not] تُحِطْ [you encompass] بِهِۦ [of it] خُبْرًۭا [any knowledge]
ayahs.transliteration: Wakayfa tasbiru AAala malam tuhit bihi khubra

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرًا وَلَآ أَعْصِى لَكَ أَمْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] سَتَجِدُنِىٓ [You will find me] إِن [if] شَآءَ [Allah wills] ٱللَّهُ [Allah wills] صَابِرًۭا [patient] وَلَآ [and not] أَعْصِى [I will disobey] لَكَ [your] أَمْرًۭا [order]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala satajidunee in shaa Allahusabiran wala aAAsee laka amra

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ فَإِنِ ٱتَّبَعْتَنِى فَلَا تَسْـَٔلْنِى عَن شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ أُحْدِثَ لَكَ مِنْهُ ذِكْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَإِنِ [Then if] ٱتَّبَعْتَنِى [you follow me] فَلَا [(do) not] تَسْـَٔلْنِى [ask me] عَن [about] شَىْءٍ [anything] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] أُحْدِثَ [I present] لَكَ [to you] مِنْهُ [of it] ذِكْرًۭا [a mention]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala fa-ini ittabaAAtanee falatas-alnee AAan shay-in hatta ohditha lakaminhu thikra

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِى ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَا ۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقْتَهَا لِتُغْرِقَ أَهْلَهَا لَقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًٔا إِمْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱنطَلَقَا [So they both set out] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] رَكِبَا [they had embarked] فِى [on] ٱلسَّفِينَةِ [the ship] خَرَقَهَا ۖ [he made a hole in it] قَالَ [He said] أَخَرَقْتَهَا [Have you made a hole in it] لِتُغْرِقَ [to drown] أَهْلَهَا [its people] لَقَدْ [Certainly] جِئْتَ [you have done] شَيْـًٔا [a thing] إِمْرًۭا [grave]
ayahs.transliteration: Fantalaqa hattaitha rakiba fee assafeenati kharaqahaqala akharaqtaha litughriqa ahlaha laqadji/ta shay-an imra

words.translation: he made a hole in it
Have you made a hole in it

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَلَمْ [Did not] أَقُلْ [I say] إِنَّكَ [indeed, you] لَن [never] تَسْتَطِيعَ [will be able] مَعِىَ [with me] صَبْرًۭا [(to have) patience]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala alam aqul innaka lan tastateeAAamaAAiya sabra

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذْنِى بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرْهِقْنِى مِنْ أَمْرِى عُسْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] لَا [(Do) not] تُؤَاخِذْنِى [blame me] بِمَا [for what] نَسِيتُ [I forgot] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُرْهِقْنِى [be hard (upon) me] مِنْ [in] أَمْرِى [my affair] عُسْرًۭا [(raising) difficulty]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala la tu-akhithneebima naseetu wala turhiqnee min amree AAusra

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا لَقِيَا غُلَـٰمًا فَقَتَلَهُۥ قَالَ أَقَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا زَكِيَّةًۢ بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ لَّقَدْ جِئْتَ شَيْـًٔا نُّكْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱنطَلَقَا [Then they both set out] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] لَقِيَا [they met] غُلَـٰمًۭا [a boy] فَقَتَلَهُۥ [then he killed him] قَالَ [He said] أَقَتَلْتَ [Have you killed] نَفْسًۭا [a soul] زَكِيَّةًۢ [pure] بِغَيْرِ [for other than] نَفْسٍۢ [a soul] لَّقَدْ [Certainly] جِئْتَ [you have done] شَيْـًۭٔا [a thing] نُّكْرًۭا [evil]
ayahs.transliteration: Fantalaqa hattaitha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qalaaqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad ji/ta shay-annukra
